title: Is it Number One Or Number Two
itunes:title: Is it Number One Or Number Two
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 29 year old single woman and I’ve been dating a 29 year old man for 4 years. We had an on-and-off relationship and we broke up over a year ago and he met a chick and she fell in love with him quickly. He said it was just casual sex but when he and I decided to get back together, she wouldn’t stop bothering us. She caused problems in our relationship all the time and one night she went to his house drunk, so he made her some coffee and let her sleep on his couch....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 29 year old single woman and I’ve been dating a 29 year old man for 4 years. We had an on-and-off relationship and we broke up over a year ago and he met a chick and she fell in love with him quickly. He said it was just casual sex but when he and I decided to get back together, she wouldn’t stop bothering us. She caused problems in our relationship all the time and one night she went to his house drunk, so he made her some coffee and let her sleep on his couch....................
